scripts.copy:components: npx copyfiles -f ./node_modules/list.js/dist/* dist/assets/js/listjs/ && npx copyfiles -u 5 ./node_modules/@sbb-esta/lyne-components/dist/lyne-components/*.* dist/assets/js/lyne-components/ && npx copyfiles -u 4 ./node_modules/ux-components/dist/ux-components/*.* dist/assets/js/ux-components/
